Package soot.util.dot

Classes for creating graphs as input to Dot.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DotGraphConstants
    Defines several constants used to generate a Dot graph.
    Renderable  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDotGraphElement  
    DotGraph
    Allow a serialized drawing, following steps: new DotGraph draw(Directed/Undirected)Edge, attachAttributes, addNode plot
    DotGraphAttribute
    A class for specifying Dot graph attributes.
    DotGraphCommand
    Encodes general Dot commands.
    DotGraphEdge
    Graph edges are the major elements of a graph
    DotGraphNode
    A Dot graph node with various attributes.
    DotGraphUtility  

Package soot.util.dot Description
